scripts.build:example: cd packages/example && rm -rf node_modules && pnpm install
scripts.build:all: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build:types && pnpm run build:snap && pnpm run build:adapter && pnpm run build:example
scripts.start:example:local: cd packages/example && pnpm run run dev
scripts.start:example:production: cd packages/example && pnpm run run dev
scripts.demo:local: concurrently  --raw --kill-others "pnpm run run start:snap" "pnpm run run start:example:local"
